snippet: The presidents of 93 Catholic colleges and universities have sent a letter to House leaders urging them to pass a bill that includes a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants.
abstract: Presidents of 93 Catholic colleges and universities send letter to House Speaker John A Boehner and Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi urging them to pass comprehensive immigration bill that includes a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The presidents of 93 Catholic colleges and universities have sent a letter to House leaders urging them to pass a bill that includes a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants.
